projects.title: TIC TAC TOE Game
projects.bodyText:
---
- Classic Tic Tac Toe Game built for **Android** using **Java**.
 - Offers two exciting modes: **Player vs Player** and **Player vs Computer**.
 - Challenge your Friends in Player vs Player mode.
 - Test your skills against an AI opponent in Player vs Computer mode.
 - Enjoy a **User-Friendly** and **Intuitive Interface**.
 - A Perfect Game for Leisure and Brain Exercise.

projects.title: Calculator App
projects.bodyText:
---
- An Android Calculator App developed using **Java**.
 - Performs **Calculations** with ease and precision.
  - Features a User-Friendly interface for effortless operation.
  - Not only Calculates but also **Stores** previous calculations.
  - Utilizes **Room Database** to securely save Calculation history.

projects.title: To-Do List App
projects.bodyText:
---
- A **Java** based Android app for efficient Task Management.
 - Empowers Users to **Add, Delete, and Mark Tasks as Done** with ease.
 - Seamlessly Stores tasks in a **Database** for Future Reference.
 - Offers a User-Friendly interface for a smooth Task Management experience.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.bodyText:
---
- An Android App developed using **Java** for **Up-to-Date** Weather Information.
 - Fetches Weather Data from an **API** using the **Volley**.
 - Provides Weather information for the **Current Location**.
 - Allows Users to **Search** for the Weather in any City.
 - Displays **Weather Details** such as Temp, Weather Conditions, Humidity and Wind Speed.
 - Offers an **Hourly Weather Forecast** for the next 5 days.

projects.title: Currency Converter App
projects.bodyText:
---
- User-friendly Android App for Real-Time **Currency Conversion**.
 - Utilizes **Retrofit** for API integration.
 - Fetches **Up-to-Date** Currency Rates when **Internet is Available**.
- Offers **Offline** support, ensuring functionality without an **Internet Connection**.
- Utilizes **Room Database** for efficient **Data Storage**.
- Follows the **MVVM** Architectural pattern for organized code.

projects.title: Academic Sysetem App
projects.bodyText:
---
- Developed in **Java**, the Academic System App is designed to streamline **Academic Data Management**.
 - Efficiently stores essential **Student information** including Class details, Test scores, Attendance records, and Fee records.
- Utilizes the power of the **Room Database** to securely store and retrieve Student data.
- Simplifies the administrative tasks of **Educational Institutions** by centralizing Students records.

projects.title: Torch Light App
projects.bodyText:
---
 - Android App Developed using Kotlin
 - The Torch Light App transforms your Mobile device into a handy **FlashLight**.
 - Instantly **Activates** and **Deactivates** the Device's Flashlight for convenient illumination.
